mapper.insert: insert into lg_goods (goodsId, goodsName, amount, weight, volume, specificationType, itemTypeId, remarks, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{specificationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_goods set goodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, specificationType = #{specificationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemTypeId = #{itemtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goodsId, goodsName, amount, weight, volume, specificationType, itemTypeId, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_goods where goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goodsId, goodsName, amount, weight, volume, specificationType, itemTypeId, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_goods
